conversation_flow.user_message: Show me which deals are stalled in my pipeline and what actions will move them forward.
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Analyzed $18M pipeline - 12 deals stalled ($4.2M at risk).

| Status | Deals | Value |
|--------|-------|-------|
| On Track | 28 | $9.8M |
| At Risk | 7 | $4.0M |
| Stalled | 12 | $4.2M |

**Top Stalled:** TechCorp ($890K, 34 days), Global Mfg ($720K, 28 days), Apex Financial ($580K, 25 days)

**Root Causes:** 5 missing exec sponsor, 4 competitor eval, 3 budget pending

Want details on top stalled deals?
conversation_flow.description: Pipeline analysis with stalled deal identification

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, give me the details on TechCorp and Global Manufacturing
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Deep analysis on both deals:

**TechCorp ($890K):** Champion went silent 18 days ago, new CFO reviewing all purchases
→ Re-engage via different stakeholder, prepare CFO business case

**Global Mfg ($720K):** Champion active but legal review blocking contract
→ Offer pre-approved template, escalate with legal concession

Both significantly over your 45-day avg close time.

Generate action plans?
conversation_flow.description: Deep dive on priority stalled deals

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, create action plans with specific next steps
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Action plans created:

**TechCorp:** Research CFO → Call VP IT for intro → Send CFO ROI analysis → VP-to-CFO outreach

**Global Mfg:** Call champion → Send pre-approved template → Offer 30-day out clause → Legal-to-legal call

**Assigned:** Sarah Kim (TechCorp exec alignment), Legal fast-track (Global)

**Target:** Both back on track within 10 days

See full pipeline acceleration plan?
conversation_flow.description: Specific action plans with tasks and owners

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, show me how to accelerate the entire pipeline
conversation_flow.agent_response:
$6.8M can be accelerated with targeted actions:

| Action | Value | Days Saved |
|--------|-------|------------|
| Exec alignment | $3.2M | 12 days |
| Contract fast-track | $1.8M | 8 days |
| Proof-of-value | $1.8M | 15 days |

**Quick Wins This Week:** DataFlow $340K (awaiting sig), Summit $280K (Friday approval), Tech Dynamics $190K (in DocuSign)

**Forecast Impact:** +$2.4M to Q4 commit

Assign tasks to team?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, assign tasks and set up tracking
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Tasks assigned with tracking enabled:

| Rep | Tasks | Deadline |
|-----|-------|----------|
| Mike Chen | 6 | This week |
| Lisa Torres | 4 | 5 days |
| James Park | 8 | 7 days |

**Tracking:** Daily Slack alerts, stage change notifications, 7-day stall warning (vs 21)

**Targets:** Reduce stall time to 10 days, move $4.2M back to active, +$2.4M Q4 commit

Generate summary?

Pipeline acceleration complete!

| Result | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Pipeline analyzed | $18M (47 deals) |
| Stalled identified | 12 deals ($4.2M) |
| Tasks assigned | 21 actions |
| Quick wins | $810K this week |

**Outcomes:** Stall time 21→10 days, +$2.4M Q4 commit, pipeline health 60%→78%

Your $4.2M in stalled deals now have action plans with automated tracking and 7-day early warning.
